result.markdown:
---
title: "ggplot demo"
editor: visual
engine: knitr
---

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(ggplot2)

ggplot(data = mtcars, mapping = aes(x = mpg, y = hp)) + 
  geom_point()
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](ggplot_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-1-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::
